TopicTitle: The Samurai Space Services (Episode 2 is now out!)

Articles.Content:
Hey people, Quietsamurai98 here, with the official KSP SSS LP Thread!

I just started making videos, so please any feedback would be helpful.

Link to the playlist:

Samurai Space Services is a career let's play, and has no mods for now.

Please, leave any suggestions/feedback here in this thread or in the video's comments on Google+, if you don't mind having it shoved down your throat.
